amdiMenu.panelText:
📚 Queen Amdi Commands are classified into 5 categories :

```01.Primary Commands - All main commands.(Any user allowed)

02.Download Commands - Media downloading commands.

03.Logo Commands - Logo making commands.

04.Admin Commands - Groups related commands.(Only group admins allowed)

05.Profile Commands - Bot settings and bot WhatsApp profile related commands.(Only Bot owner and VIP users allowed)```

*Please choose a command category and get the command list.*
amdiMenu.SpecialAdmin:
*(There is special feature that you can block specific commands for the group. Type commands that need to block in the group description without the prefix.)*
Example: *fb,video,song* add as group description's top line.

anti_functions.badwordkick: *⛔ Bad words are forbidden by group admins.*
anti_functions.antilinkkick: *⛔ Link sharing is forbidden by group admins.*

ban.bandesc: Ban an user or a group from using bot.
ban.askWhatBan:
🤔 What you want to ban?

.ban user
.ban group
ban.banEx:
.ban user @user
.ban user (Reply to user's message)
.ban group groupJID
.ban group (Command in group)
.ban (Command in user's inbox or in group)
ban.banuserEx:
*🤔 Please give me an user*

```.ban user @user
.ban user (Reply to user's message)
.ban (Command in user's inbox)```
ban.noBanOwners: *👑 Can't ban Queen Amdi developer team!*
ban.banMsg: you are banned from using bot‼️
ban.banGrp: This group blocked from using bot‼️
ban.unbandesc: Un-Ban an user or a group from using bot.
ban.unbanEx: Please do @tag/reply! or give a JID
ban.banlistDESC: Get banned user and group list.
ban.banListText:
Here is the list of banned JIDs.

You can unban them by selecting below.

🤔 Do you want to unban this JID?
ban.delmanager:

🤔 Do you want to remove this JID?

botCTRL.backupDESC: Get a backup of databases list.
botCTRL.resetDBtxt:
Please choose an option to reset database.

*Warning: This will erase your databases and may disconnect your bot!*
Make sure to backup your database by _.backup_ command.
botCTRL.chooseDB:
*Please tell me a database name to restore,*
  * .restore settings
 * .restore groupset
  * .restore welcome
  * .restore goodbye
  * .restore ban
  * .restore delall
  * .restore rates
botCTRL.AI_USAGE: Type a message after Amdi word!
botCTRL.RL_DESC: Get user message reacts list and manage.
botCTRL.RL_Text: You can view and remove user message reacts from this list.
botCTRL.NO_OWNERS: *👑 You can't setup reacts for Queen Amdi Team!*
botCTRL.NO_OWNER_REACTS: *👑 You can't use developer team's reactions!*

deleteMsg.delDesc: Delete message for everyone. (Delete bot message everyone and if bot is admin, can delete message as Admin)

deleteMsg.delAllDesc: To delete every message sending by a banned user from the group.

deleteMsg.noDelAllOwners: *👑 Can't delete all Queen Amdi developer team messages!*

downloadSocialMedia.igDesc: Download instagram image post or videos.

downloadYT.needYTLink: *Please give me a YouTube link or name!*
downloadYT.Title: *Title :*
downloadYT.songListTXT: Please select the song you want from below list. If you can't find the correct one, please command with correct YT Link.
downloadYT.videoListTXT: Please select the video you want from below list. If you can't find the correct one, please command with correct YT Link.
downloadYT.noSearch:
*Can't find this in YouTube. Give me the direct YT Link!*

Use *.yt [song_name]* to get link.
downloadYT.YTINFO: Get info of a YouTube video.
downloadYT.videoTOdoc:

_Wait, I am trying to send it as a document..._
downloadYT.audioTOdoc:

fake_reply.FAKE_REP_DESC: Reply to a fake message as that user send it before. DON'T MIS-USE THIS FEATURE!
fake_reply.NEED_FAKE: *Please reply to a message and give me fake message!*
fake_reply.NEED_DATA:
*Please give correct data in correct format!*

.fakerep this_is_reply_message {jid=CHAT_JID@xxxxxx/user=USER_PHONE_NUMBER}

CHAT_JID: You can get JID address by using *.jid* command.

USER_PHONE_NUMBER: User phone number with country code. No plus mark(+) and spaces. (Example: 947xxxxxxxx if Sri Lankan number)
fake_reply.NEED_CORRECT_FORMAT:
*Wrong data format!*

.fakerep this_is_reply_message {jid=CHAT_JID@xxxxxx/user=USER_PHONE_NUMBER}

CHAT_JID: You can get JID address by using *.jid* command.

USER_PHONE_NUMBER: User phone number with country code. No plus mark(+) and spaces. (Example: 947xxxxxxxx if Sri Lankan number)
fake_reply.OWNER_DETECTED: *👑 Queen Amdi developer team numbers detected!* You can't make fake reply for their numbers.

grpManager.ANTILINK_TXT: You can configure anti-links feature by using this list.
grpManager.ALLOWURLSET:
*Add allowed links list*
You can add links to share when Anti-Links is enabled. To do that, you need to enter the links separated by commas like below.
grpManager.NOTALLOWURLSET:
*Add not-allowed links list*
You can add links as prohibited when Anti-Links is enabled. To do that, you need to enter the links separated by commas and started with *!* mark like below.

settings.setDesc: Change the main settings of bot.
settings.setListText: You can change settings by using this list easily.
settings.applyText: You can customize captions, processing messages, button messages style and button message links.
settings.formatInvalid: ❌ *Your format is incorrect. Please use below format.*
settings.rulesCustomizer:
*Please follow below rules when customize button/template messages*

* Mention the customize type.(Alive,Welcome,Bye,Panel)
* Adding a text is mandatory.
* You can add maximum 5 (any) buttons for template messages.(url,button)
* You can only add 3 *buttons* for standard button messages.(No url buttons)
* You can add an image as,
    ↳ Direct image URL
    ↳ bot_dp
    ↳ user_dp
settings.viewSETListText: You can change settings by using *.settings* command.
settings.applyMODText:
Please choose an action.
* Add a new user to existing.
* Remove existing and add a new.
settings.customSetHelp:
You can setup custom prefix character by using *.apply* command.

Send the character you want and reply to that message *.apply* and select custom prefix option.
settings.TOO_LONG_PREFIX:
*This prefix have too much characters!*
Length of your given character: {}
settings.BTN_TOGGLE_DESC: Turn on or off button messages.

stickers.STICPACKDESC: Make sticker pack from a ZIPPED images and video set.

stickers.CHECKURDM: *Please check your inbox messages. Stickers have been sent to private chat🤗*
stickers.EMO2STICDESC: Convert an emoji to a sticker.
stickers.EMO2PICDESC: Convert an emoji to a picture.
